hero.headline: About Me
hero.introduction: I'm Sebastian Ballen — a Full-Stack Software Developer and Google Cloud Associate Cloud Engineer based in Bogotá, Colombia. I build digital experiences with the precision of an architect and the creativity of a designer.

origin.title: From Curiosity to Code
origin.description: My path into software engineering started with a fascination for how digital products work under the hood. Studying Computer Technology at Lake Superior College in Minnesota gave me the technical foundation, while the multicultural experience shaped how I think about building products for diverse audiences.

growth.title: Building at Scale
growth.description: At Magneto Global, I went from frontend specialist to full-stack engineer — leading component library migrations, building backend services on AWS, and resolving critical bugs that reduced system errors by 95%. Every challenge taught me that great software is as much about architecture and process as it is about code.

present.title: Engineering with Purpose
present.description: Today I'm pursuing my Software Engineering degree while continuing to build. My focus is on scalable systems, cloud architecture, and the intersection of design and engineering. I believe the best products come from engineers who think like architects and design like artists.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Clean code, tested architecture, and measurable outcomes.

curiosity.title: Curiosity
curiosity.description: Continuous learning and experimentation with new tools and patterns.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.description: Documentation, knowledge sharing, and making complex things understandable.

metadata.title: About — Sebastian Ballen
metadata.description: Learn about Sebastian Ballen's journey as a Full-Stack Software Engineer, his approach to building digital products, and what drives his work.
